revised_title: Genetically Transformed Plants: Advances and Applications
tldr: This preface discusses the rapid advancements in genetic engineering and plant transformation techniques. The authors highlight the potential benefits of these techniques, such as creating plants with novel genotypes and improved crop varieties. They also mention the development of regulatory elements for gene expression and the potential for conferring resistance to pathogens, pests, and herbicides. The authors hope that this collection of forward-looking papers will inspire further research and efforts in plant biotechnology.
